numericalExperiment.rationale: To explore the degree to which future climate states depend on the initial climate state.
numericalExperiment.description: Historical Ensemble of 20th Century Simulations, as in experiment 3.2 but initiated from different points in experiment 3.1. Yield an ensemble of size â‰¥3.

numericalRequirement.name: 3.2E.ic
numericalRequirement.description: Additional runs, initialised at different points in the control run

numericalRequirement.name: 3.2E.bc.wmg_anth.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of historical anthropogenic well mixed gases, including CO2

numericalRequirement.name: 3.2E.bc.wmg_volc.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of historical volcanic well mixed gases, including CO2

numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of historical short lived gas species

numericalRequirement.description: Imposed changing concentrations of historical anthropogenic aerosol precursors
